data.text: @HateTurnips @ITbarbie @nzherald So why bother to be worried about second hand smokers. They got cancer as well
@HateTurnips @LucasPsychology @nzherald That is a laughable response. For COVID comparing rates with other illnesses etc is sensible and gives perspective.
@ITbarbie @LucasPsychology @nzherald So when they report road deaths then should include all other causes of deaths for a comparison? They donâ€™t.
@HateTurnips @LucasPsychology @nzherald All the other things that kill us every day... Without them covid numbers mean nothing as there's no perspective
@DillBadBoy @nzherald They should be extended until the end of the year just to piss people off.
@LucasPsychology @HateTurnips @nzherald sadly, they do not show comparative stats.
@LucasPsychology @nzherald While that may be true, have you ever had the flu? It is fricking horrid! Flu is not a bad cold...just saying...

@HateTurnips @LucasPsychology @nzherald Umm most are dying with covid not from like it has been at the start. But hey we got the 1200+ side effects to look forward too going to hospital in the coming years but hey should they get treatment I mean the gave consent for the jab.
@LucasPsychology @nzherald They are reporting Covid related deaths in a Covid related article.
